citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process from 11:15am -
11:55am on September 8, 2022. The inspector spoke to the licensee's wife who stated that the licensee was off site for
the day.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process from 11:15am - 
11:55am on September 8, 2022.  The inspector spoke to the licensee's wife who stated that the licensee was off site for 
the day. 
 
 
 
End Section
